cot: The testimony from Armstrong states that he moved the mirror after the incident (Testimony 3), but the Tres Bien Floor Plans (Evidence 11) would show the original position of the mirror before it was moved. This contradicts his statement that he did not touch anything else (Testimony 4), as moving the mirror would be altering the crime scene.
